meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>man</kanji> who is <kanji>superior</kanji> to us is an <vocabulary>actor</vocabulary>, or more specifically a <vocabulary>male actor</vocabulary>.

Just a word of warning: over the years this word has taken on the connotation of "adult film actor" so most people would use 俳優 for "actor" now. You'll be learning that word very soon!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
